meanings.definition: A person who is well known in fashionable society and is fond of social activities.
meanings.sent1: The socialite attended all the glamorous parties in town.
meanings.sent2: The socialite was always seen at the trendiest events.
meanings.sent3: The socialite's calendar was filled with soirees and gatherings.
meanings.sent4: In the world of high society, she was the reigning socialite.
meanings.sent5: Her reputation as a socialite was unmatched in the city.

meanings.definition: A person who is prominent in fashionable society.
meanings.sent1: Being a socialite meant being a familiar face at elite gatherings.
meanings.sent2: The socialite's name was always in the society pages.
meanings.sent3: The socialite's wardrobe was the envy of all her friends.
meanings.sent4: She was the socialite everyone wanted to befriend.
meanings.sent5: Her elegance and charm made her the ultimate socialite.
